sect1.title: LogicalFileSuperOwners

row.entry: A null-terminated string containing the logical name of the file.
LogicalFileSuperOwners returns a dataset in the following format:

sect1.para: The LogicalFileSuperOwners function returns a list of the logical filenames of all the SuperFiles that contain the filename as a sub-file.
This function is not included in a superfile transaction.
sect1.programlisting: OUTPUT(STD.File.LogicalFileSuperowners('~CLASS::RT::SF::Daily1')); //returns all SuperFiles that “own” the Daily1 file
